summary: Provides utilities to configure, launch, and tear down a local ACME certificate authority server together with an HTTP reverse‑proxy, allocating unique ports and directory URLs for each test node so that multiple integration tests can run in parallel without interference.
business_intent: Facilitates reliable, automated CI testing of Certbot by supplying isolated, on‑demand ACME server instances that mimic real‑world certificate issuance flows, enabling concurrent execution of integration test suites.
